channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Chris and Lee are in Stone to create a fun family garden for Chloe and her daughters that also serves as a space to remember their late husband and dad Errol.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Charlie Dimmock and Flo Headlam are in Pershore to create Adrian and Jenny's dream woodland garden with a gothic twist.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Great House Giveaway
channel.desc: Simon gives strangers Noam and Sara the cash to buy, renovate and sell a house in Newport. But will their grand designs stop them from making enough money to buy a house of their own.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Great House Giveaway
channel.desc: Simon gives Mair and Dafydd the cash to buy, renovate and sell a historic chapel in Neath. But even with Simon's help and a generous budget, can they restore this local landmark and sell it on.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Great House Giveaway
channel.desc: Simon gives strangers Nicole and Karl the cash to buy, renovate and sell a terrace house in Oldbury. They have six months to complete it, but can they make any profit when they sell it.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: My Floating Home
channel.desc: Suffolk boatyard specialists Mary and Simon's dream is a futuristic aquatic pod. They're experts in their aquatic field, but have they taken on more than they can handle.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: My Floating Home
channel.desc: Alan and Val put their savings on the line for a high-tech boat to help them spend time with their family. But first they need to learn how to live on the water.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: My Floating Home
channel.desc: Seasoned floating homeowners Pat and Sue plan to spend their retirement on a state-of-the-art Dutch barge. But will their expensive tastes sink the project.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Sex Actually with Alice Levine
channel.desc: Alice explores the flourishing world of sex and wellness, from a full-body orgasm workshop to an intimate yoni massage . Contains scenes of a sexual nature, nudity and strong language.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Let's Get Laid
channel.desc: Gordon Laid is a soldier returning to London after WW2. He gets mixed up in a series of murders and mistaken identities. Bawdy romp with Robin Askwith. Contains nudity and 70s social attitudes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Cruel Passion
channel.desc: A young orphan girl Justine falls into a world of cruel depravity while her sister Juliette thrives in vice. Adaptation of de Sade's novel. Contains distressing scenes and nudity.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Zeta One
channel.desc: Tongue-in-cheek Barbarella-style sci-fi caper. Amazonian space women invade Earth in search of a male to propagate their species. Contains nudity and 70s social attitudes.

channel.title: The Beyonce Experience
channel.desc: Former police officer, Aaron Carty, swapped his uniform for high heels to perform as Beyonce at UK Black Pride.

channel.title: My Floating Home

channel.title: The Great House Giveaway
channel.desc: Simon gives budding interior designer Cora and builder Jonny the cash to buy, renovate and sell a house in Kirkham. It has damp, sloping floorboards and leaking ceilings. Can they make a profit.

channel.title: Great British Dog Walks
channel.desc: Phil takes in the beauty of the Lake District with SAS hero Billy Billingham, as Billy shares his life story, from knife fights on the streets to serving on battlefields.
